name: Angry Ape - LD 49
description:
-------------------------------

Fkn Rats Man

-------------------------------

Controls are WASD or arrow keys

Up and space to jump

You can hold the jump while on the ground to charge it up. The jump is executed when you release the key.

If you hold down and press jump you will do a hop instead

Press B to punch 

The ape gets angry if it's spat on by those disrespectful rats

-------------------------------

Music by: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrpCS6ByqcCv_Rs-xcu3boQ
